
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VClockEnableDivider.cpp
          VClockEnableDivider.h
          VClockEnableDivider__Syms.cpp
          VClockEnableDivider__Syms.h
          VClockEnableDivider__Trace.cpp
          VClockEnableDivider__Trace__Slow.cpp
  DEPENDS ClockEnableDivider.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ClockEnableDivider.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VClockEnableDivider STATIC
    VClockEnableDivider.cpp
    VClockEnableDivider__Syms.cpp
    VClockEnableDivider__Trace.cpp
    VClockEnableDivider__Trace__Slow.cpp
    ClockEnableDivider.v
)

target_compile_options(VClockEnableDivider PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VClockEnableDivider PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VClockEnableDivider verilated)
